channel.title: How do i change the ip the 508 connects to?
channel.description: Excuse me and welcome all;I need to know what file the ip to connect to the server is in ad how to change it.I have my ip up right now and the client only connects to localhost;If anyone would be willing to help me i'd be glad.

item.title: How do i change the ip the 508 connects to?
item.dc:creator: @Magebankreturns Magebankreturns
item.description:
@Magebankreturns wrote:

You don’t understand; all i need to do is find the file where the ip connection for the 508 client is held.Does anyone with aBRAINknow where to find this.Honestly,i havent worked with 508’s yet but i need to change the ip connection so i can get started.Thank you all who are helping.

Hai Duken yours,
-Magebankreturns

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the ip the 508 connects to?

item.title: How do i change the ip the 508 connects to?
item.dc:creator: @0_W_N_3_D2 0 W N 3 D
item.description:
@0_W_N_3_D2 wrote:

u need JDK 6u 6-10… ive been downloading + installing JRE 6u10 and hevent been noticing it. It wasted 12 hours of my life tbh… now finally at 2:10 am in the night i found JDK 6u6 on google… i got so pissed i was about to break my comp monitor with an axe tbh…

item.title: How do i change the ip the 508 connects to?
item.dc:creator: @ash_2oo8 ash 2oo8
item.description:
@ash_2oo8 wrote:

well, go into your client file’s then go into client.java and search for 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.0 or sumthink, if u found that maybe change to 43594? + have u got the 508 client or a normal 1? if u have a normal client then it will not work…
